{{ employee.department }} {{ employee.fullName }} {{ employee.dateOfBirth }} {{ employee.dateOfEmployment }} {{ employee.salary }}
import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { DecimalPipe } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employees', templateUrl: './employees.component.html' }) export class EmployeesComponent { public employees: Employee[] = []; constructor(http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'employees').subscribe(result => { this.employees = result; }, error => console.error(error)); } } interface Employee { id: number; department: string; fullName: string; dateOfBirth: Date; dateOfEmployment: Date; salary: DecimalPipe; }
